maqras.text: 87|1|Tumi tomara sumahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
87|2|yijane srsti karaiche, tara pichata suthama karaiche.
87|3|Arau yijane (bhagya) nirdharana karaiche tara pichata satpatha pradarsana karaiche
87|4|arau yijane trna-lata utpanna karaiche
87|5|tara pichata se'iboraka ka'la abarjanata parainata karaiche.
87|6|Anatipalame ami tomaka patha karaama, phalata tumi napaharaiba
87|7|kerala allahe yi bicarae tara bahirae. Niscaya te'om prakasya arau aprakasya sakalo jane.
87|8|Arau ami tomara babe sahaja patha sugama karai dima.
87|9|Eteke upadesa diya, yadi upadesa phalaprasu haya
87|10|upadesa siye'i grahana karaiba yiye bhaya karae.
87|11|Arau yi hatabhagya si iyaka agraahya karaiba
87|12|si bhayabaha ju'ita praraesa karaiba.
87|13|Tara pichata si tata mrtyubarano karaiba noraaraiba arau jiraita'o thakiba noraaraiba.
87|14|Niscaya saphalata labha karaiba yiye atmasud'dhi karaiba.
87|15|Arau tara pratipalakara nama smarana karaiba arau chalata adaya karaiba.
87|16|Kintu tomaloke prthiraira jiranaka praadhan'ya diya
87|17|athaca akhiraata sarbottama arau sthayi.
87|18|Niscaya iyara barnana ache purbararti chahiphasamuhata
87|19|ibraahima arau muchara chahiphasamuhata.
88|1|Tomara ocarata acchannakarai (kiyamatara) sambada ahichene
88|2|se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ha’ba aranata
88|3|karmaklanta, paraisraanta
88|4|sihamta praraesa karaiba jbalanta ju'ita
88|5|uttapta utala nijaraara pani pana karaibalai diya ha’ba
88|6|sihamtara babe kamitabisista ghamhara bahirae ana kono khadya nathakiba
88|7|i sihamtara pusti'o sadhana nakaraiba arau ksudha'o nibrtta nakaraiba.
88|8|Arau se'idina kichumana mukhamandala ha’ba anandojjbala
88|9|nija karmara saphalyata paraitrpta
88|10|su'ucca jannatata
88|11|tata sihamte kono anarthaka katha sunibalai napaba
88|12|tata thakiba prabahamana nijaraa
88|13|tata thakiba unnata sayyasamuha
88|14|Arau prastuta thakiba panapatrasamuha
88|15|arau sarai saraikai rakha garausamuha
88|16|arau bistrta parai thoraa dalicasamuha
88|17|ihamte utara pine drstipata nakarae neki, kenekai taka srsti karaa haiche
88|18|arau akasara phale, kenekai taka urd'dhata sthapana karaa haiche
88|19|arau parbatasamuhara phale, se'ibora kenekai pratisthita karaa haiche
88|20|arau prthiraikhanara phale, kidarae taka bistrta karaa haiche
88|21|eteke tumi upadesa diya, tumito kerala ejana upadesadata
88|22|tumi sihamtara oparata sakti prayogakarai nahaya.
88|23|Kintu konoba'i mukha ghuraa'i la’le athaba kupharai karaile
88|24|tente allahe taka mahasasti pradana karaiba.
88|25|Niscaya amara ocarate'i sihamtara pratyarartana.
88|26|Arau sihamtara hicapa-nikaca amarae'i dayitba.
89|1|Phajarara samayara sapata
89|2|sapata daha raatira
89|3|sapata yora arau biyorara
89|4|sapata raatira, yetiya i bidaya laya.
89|5|Iyara majata bodhasampanna byaktira babe drrha pramana na'ine
89|6|tumi dekha na'ine, tomara pratipalake ada sampradayara lagata ki acarana karaichila
89|7|iraama gotrara lagata, yihamte adhikarai achila su'ucca prasadara
89|8|yara samatulya (jati) kono desate srsti karaa horaa na'i
89|9|arau chamuda sampradayara lagata (ki acarana karaichila) yisakale bhaiyamata sila kati ghara nirmana karaichila
89|10|arau suladandara adhikarai phira'a'unara lagata (ki acarana karaichila)
89|11|yisakale desata simalanghana karaichila
89|12|tara pichata tata asanti brd'dhi karaichila.
89|13|Phalata tomara pratipalake sihamtara oparata sastira cabuka maraile.
89|14|Niscaya tomara pratipalaka satarka drsti raakhe.
89|15|Arau manuhara prakrti enekuraa ye, yetiya tara pratipalake taka sanmana arau anugraha pradana karai paraiksa karae, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka sanmanita karaiche’.
89|16|Arau yetiya taka paraiksa karaibalai tara jiraika sankucita karai diye, tetiya si kaya, ‘mora pratipalake moka lanchita karaiche’.
89|17|Ketiya'o nahaya, baram tomaloke etimaka samadara nakaraa
89|18|Arau tomaloke micakinaka khadya pradana karaibalai parasparae parasparaka utsahita nakaraa
89|19|arau tomaloke uttaraadhikarara sampada sampurnaraupe graasa karai peloraa
89|20|arau tomaloke dhana-sampadaka atikai bhalaporaa
89|21|ketiya'o nahaya. Yetiya prthiraikhanaka curna-bicurna karaa ha’ba
89|22|arau yetiya tomara pratipalaka agamana karaiba arau phiraistasakala saraibad'dhabharae upasthita ha’ba
89|23|arau se'idina jahannamaka upasthita karaa ha’ba, se'idina manuhe smarana karaiba, kintu e'i smarana tara kona kamata ahiba
89|24|(tetiya) si ka’ba, ‘haya! E'i jiranara babe ma'i yadi kiba agraima pathalohemtena
89|25|se'idina te'omra sastira darae sasti kone'o diba noraaraiba.
89|26|Arau te'omra bandhonara darae bandhona ana kone'o diba noraaraiba.
89|27|He prasanta atma
89|28|tumi tomara pratipalakara ocaralai ubhati aha santusta arau santosabhajana hai
89|29|arau mora bandasakalara antarbhukta hai yoraa
89|30|arau mora jannatata praraesa karaa.
